subject: Your Sony PS3 is waiting - please confirm for shipment
body:
Your Sony PS3 is waiting - lease confirm for shipment

http://slumimpress.com/t/qwjbj74ii/20855




















This is a third party a d v e r t i s e m e n t  sent to you by the list owner.  

If you  n o  l o n g e r  w i s h  t o  r e c e i v e email from this  a d v e r t i s e r, 

please write to 
Customer Service, PO Box 390520, 
Mountain View, CA 94039-0520 
or visit our email preference page by 
c l i c k i n g   h e r e http://slumimpress.com/t/qwjbj74ii/20856
If you do not w i s h  t o  r e c e i v e   c o r r e s p o n d e n c e  from the list manager, 

you will need to follow instructions provided by the list manager on how to  r e m o v e  yourself from their list.
Write, to be taken from the list
Plusquake
3665 S. Orlando Drive,402
Sanford, Fla. 3 2 7 7 3
or
http://slumimpress.com/u/710/producttestpanel%40speedy.uwaterloo.ca/2
